title:
The list chromatic number of the intersection of two generalized
  partition matroids
abstract:
A famous theorem of Galvin states that the list chromatic number of the
intersection of two partition matroids equals its chromatic number. Kiraly and
Berczi et. al. conjectured that this equality holds for any two matroids. We
prove this conjecture and a conjecture by Aharoni--Berger for any two
generalized partition matroids.
